Digital Pedagogy Insights

Incorporating technology into education is a challenging endeavour, with teachers facing many choices that are not easy to make.

Digital education means that teachers and students should have access to the tools they need to optimise learning; however, the primary hurdle lies in how to do this, as it is more than just harnessing technology.

Simply installing technology in classrooms will not make education more fun and interactive; the real point of difference lies in the quality of teaching.

That is why we made this tool  to assist teachers with incorporating digital technology into their teaching and learning methodologies, ultimately resulting in a better educational experience for all.
